headline.print_headline: In Finding Its Future Coach, Connecticut Turns to Its Past
headline.main: UConn Hires Randy Edsall to Rebuild a Football Program He Once Led

snippet: Edsall, who coached the Huskies for 12 seasons before leaving for Maryland, agreed to a five-year contract that is worth more than $1 million a season....
lead_paragraph: Edsall, who coached the Huskies for 12 seasons before leaving for Maryland, agreed to a five-year contract that is worth more than $1 million a season.
